thread.title: BIIF football: Waiakea-Hilo Division I semifinal postponed until Saturday
thread.title_full: BIIF football: Waiakea-Hilo Division I semifinal postponed until Saturday

author: nefeeder
title: BIIF football: Waiakea-Hilo Division I semifinal postponed until Saturday
text:
BIIF football: Waiakea-Hilo Division I semifinal postponed until Saturday Published October 17, 2015 - 3:49am Hawaii Tribune-Herald 
Friday’s night BIIF Division I football semifinal between Hilo and Waiakea was postponed because of inclement weather and rescheduled for 7:30 p.m. Saturday at Wong Stadium. 
With thunder rumbling throughout the day Friday and the continued threat of lightning, BIIF officials announced the postponement approximately 90 minutes before scheduled kickoff. 
Saturday’s start time will allow the officiating crew assigned to the Division II semifinal between Hawaii Prep-Kamehameha, set for 3 p.m. in Keaau, to turn around and work the contest between the Warriors (2-5 BIIF, 2-8) and Vikings (5-2, 5-4). 
According to the National Weather Service, more rain is in the forecast Saturday in Hilo, with thunderstorms possible in the afternoon.
